title: unnai marandu
sahitya:
unnai marandu nAn uivEnO en uyirkk-uyirAgiya deivamE kaNNA


anupallavi

  ennai marandAlum ihattai marandAlum annattai marandu nAn AruDal melindAlum


caraNam    sundara shyAmaLa indu vadanA jyOti svarUpA nAn kAdal koNDa madanA
mandahAsa ramaNA manOharA mAdhavA giridhara gOpAla murahari
